name: putin game
description:
so, this is a short platformer about putin. its currently in development. full main text: "To move clouds with rings you need cursor and touch ring, find the cursor! You can move red clouds without cursor, but it destroys after 3 seconds. Move with arrows, gun will be avalible soon." .

tutorial in playing

so, u know that you dont know anything about game, yeah? heres a tutorial for da game.

move with arrows, gun will be avalible soon, and will work in game as down arrow.

jump on red cloud at start and move it up to grab the cursor item with your cursor, but be fast, because it will be destroyed after 3 seconds!!!

then jump to start cloud and move ring cloud, pressing on ring, and then jumping on ring. yea, weird that you need to jump on it, but enjoy what is avalible.

after that play as yourself... game will be updated so this can be changed.

objects:

blue cloud: acts like a standart platform

red cloud: can be moved up and down, but dissappears after 3 seconds!

ring cloud: can be moved left and right, but firstly you need to jump on ring, and you need cursor for it!

spike: u know what it does, it kills you, restarting game. green cloud: flips and after 3 seconds you fall through it!

green door: does nothing for now, but will lead to new level!

qzeq pls play this
